invalidFormatChar@proto: format char must be one of char [xscfdbhilqBHILQ], value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidFormatChar@hades: ~[format char] must be one of char ~{xscfdbhilqBHILQ}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidConstructorParam@proto: Biffer.constructor() argument must be one of type string, number or an instance of Buffer, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidConstructorParam@hades: ~[Biffer.constructor()] argument must be one of type ~{string}, ~{number} or an instance of ~{Buffer}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidSeekParam@proto: Biffer.seek() argument must be of type number, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidSeekParam@hades: ~[Biffer.seek()] argument must be of type ~{number}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidSkipParam@proto: Biffer.skip() argument must be of type number, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidSkipParam@hades: ~[Biffer.skip()] argument must be of type ~{number}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidSliceParam@proto: Biffer.slice() argument must be of type number, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidSliceParam@hades: ~[Biffer.slice()] argument must be of type ~{number}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
